00025 #include "OgreException.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreRoot.h"
00028 #include "OgreLogManager.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Ogre {
00031     Exception* Exception::last = 0;
00032     std::list<String> Exception::msFunctionStack;
00033 
00034     Exception::Exception(int num, const String& desc, const String& src) :
00035         line( 0 ),
00036         number( num ),
00037         description( desc ),
00038         source( src ),
00039         file( "" )
00040     {
00041         // Log this error
00042         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(this->getFullDescription());
00043 
00044         // Set last
00045         last = this;
00046     }
00047 
00048     Exception::Exception(int num, const String& desc, const String& src, char* fil, long lin) :
00049         line( lin ),
00050         number( num ),
00051         description( desc ),
00052         source( src ),
00053         file( fil )
00054     {
00055         // Log this error
00056         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(this->getFullDescription());
00057 
00058         // Set last
00059         last = this;
00060     }
00061 
00062     Exception::Exception(const Exception& rhs)
00063         : line( rhs.line ), number( rhs.number ), description( rhs.description ), source( rhs.source ), file( rhs.file )
00064     {
00065     }
00066 
00067     void Exception::operator = ( const Exception& rhs )
00068     {
00069         description = rhs.description;
00070         number = rhs.number;
00071         source = rhs.source;
00072         file = rhs.file;
00073         line = rhs.line;
00074     }
00075 
00076     String Exception::getFullDescription(void) const
00077     {
00078         char strNum[12];
00079         String desc;
00080 
00082         sprintf( strNum, "%d", number );
00083         desc =  "An exception has been thrown!\n"
00084                 "\n"
00085                 "-----------------------------------\nDetails:\n-----------------------------------\n"
00086                 "Error #: ";
00087         desc += strNum;
00088         desc += "\nFunction: ";
00089         desc += source;
00090         desc += "\nDescription: ";
00091         desc += description;
00092         desc += ". ";
00093 
00094         if( line > 0 )
00095         {
00096             desc += "\nFile: ";
00097             desc += file;
00098 
00099             char szLine[20];
00100 
00101             desc += "\nLine: ";
00102 #ifdef OGRE_LINUX
00103             snprintf(szLine, 20, "%ld", line);
00104 #else
00105             _snprintf(szLine, 20, "%d", line);
00106 #endif
00107 
00108             desc += szLine;
00109         }
00110 
00111 #ifdef OGRE_STACK_UNWINDING
00112         String funcstack;
00113         String currfunc;
00114 
00115         funcstack += "\nStack unwinding: ";
00116 
00117         for( std::list<String>::const_iterator it = msFunctionStack.begin(); it != msFunctionStack.end(); ++it )
00118         {
00119             funcstack += *it;
00120             funcstack += "()<-";
00121         }
00122 
00123         desc += funcstack;
00124         desc += "<<beginning of stack>>";
00125 #endif
00126 
00127         return desc;
00128     }
00129 
00130     int Exception::getNumber(void) throw()
00131     {
00132         return number;
00133     }
00134 
00135     Exception* Exception::getLastException(void) throw()
00136     {
00137         return last;
00138     }
00139 
00140     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00141     void Exception::_pushFunction( const String& strFuncName ) throw()
00142     {
00143         msFunctionStack.push_front( strFuncName );
00144     }
00145 
00146     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00147     void Exception::_popFunction() throw()
00148     {
00149         msFunctionStack.pop_front();
00150     }
00151 }
